<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Harrow Carrying Case](/Equipment.aspx?ID=823)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #160: Assault on Hunting Lodge Seven](/Sources.aspx?ID=49) pg. 66</row>

**Price** 1 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This elegant wooden case contains a recessed section to hold a simple or common harrow deck and a harrow mat. The case features a watertight seal to protect its contents from the elements and everyday wear and tear.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Harrow Carrying Case
